tweets.text:
Things I thought I‚Äôd never tweet for the @EnvAgencyYNE ‚Ä¶.

A friend got this clip of a deer swimming and wondering round the #RiverDon in #KelhamIsland, #Sheffield.

It‚Äôs really nice to see nature so close to urban centres‚Ä¶.. it‚Äôs called @theoutdoorcity for a reason üôå https://t.co/caWjbvP2JT
https://t.co/0OEVh0Ug2L

@hcattt @EnvAgencySE @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyAnglia Hi There, thank you for your tweet. This is natural weed and algae and the result of the limited flow and dusty / dry conditions across the park. It‚Äôs not toxic and won‚Äôt harm the ducks. - Holly

@StinkStopthe 0.5 miles
Shortness of breath
Palpitations
Headaches
Anorexia
Insomnia
Concentration issues
Flare up of diverticular disease
Sneezing
Anxiety
Depression
Stress
Nausea
And the @EnvAgency does what exactly? https://t.co/XOSPf78qxP

tweets.text: There‚Äôs no other option at this point. But if it goes legal it needs to go legal against the @EnvAgency as well for failing in their duty of care @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @Cap_it_off #stopthestink https://t.co/dAsdRTOaP6

Well the EA finally stepped in and picked up the tail of the monstrous injustice of what has transpired over the past six months, but to me it's not over along with thousands of residents, we do not except LFG in our homes and gardens, you will be told over and over again! https://t.co/XqqqEd9Ppd

It's all go for our amazing Citizen Scientists this month! 

Riverfly surveys resumed, our 1st #ThamesEels monitoring volunteers are trained up & our Outfall Safari Team are planning their surveys along the Hogsmill.

It's great to be back out collecting data to help our rivers! https://t.co/yN5phbWLoJ
Nothing would surprise me after how the @EnvAgency have let down this community @JamesBevanEA @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA @PHE_EoEngland #stopthestink https://t.co/Alz3dHybfu

tweets.text: @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids Why can't the data be accessable in real time?
@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids Please remember to turn these ones on... as the data from the end of February is conveniently missing. #stopthestink @StinkStopthe
@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids Can we have the end of February‚Äôs data? Negligence or incompetence #stopthestink
@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids Face to face with whom? Scripted answers are not good enough. You have not listened and never will. Your arrogance beggars belief. Shame on you.
@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids Actions not words!

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids You, @EnvAgencyMids have let @RedIndustries2 slowly torture us day in day out. I don‚Äôt believe you give a damn about our physical or mental health in the slightest. Actions speak louder than words, do your job and #StopTheStink

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids Dr Scott is a well respected doctor if he‚Äôs saying the landfill is having an impact on our health, believe him. I have no confidence in you, @EnvAgencyMids. You‚Äôve let @RedIndustries2 get away with making hell for too long. Shame on you and #StopTheStink
The River Quin is a chalk stream one of only 225 in the entire world. https://t.co/UYlkUGfDla

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids Beg you come sit in my bedroom right now, 1.3 miles away from the landfill and I‚Äôm sat here HEAVING. I‚Äôm also 4 months pregnant and have a 1 year old in my home. Mental AND physical health problems it‚Äôs causing. Just #StopTheStink and let us breathe! @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off

@ClareDinnisEA @maricaoneill @EnvAgencyMids #sackclaredinnis vile PR stunt from you @ClareDinnisEA every1 can see what your doing here. you just made a bad situation even worse with your terrible selfish act. You are just pathetic. In every way chronically useless. we all see straight through you. ACTION NOW OR STAND DOWN

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids The odour is getting worse and worse, night by night and has been since 2018. This is not your priority. It can‚Äôt be. If this if you working as hard as you can, then you are inept. This is out of control. #stopthestink

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids The fumes tonight are off the scale in Westlands, they‚Äôre so strong you can smell them through the purifier, this is one of the worst nights we‚Äôve ever had so far. For gods sake woman, do something a LOT more aggressive to STOP this! @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL 'REALLY PLEASED'? - Sorry, are you nose blind? It stinks, it has all day. Could you live here and be forced to breathe this polluting, poisonous stink?You are not listening to GPs, the local hospital, or the residents. We need action, and by tonight's stink, it isn't happening.

@Cap_it_off @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL The full details of the permit change which allowed the huge increase in waste needs to be analysed by the community. How did it come to this? Was it handled properly by @EnvAgency ? Did relevant people have opportunity to object? Did @RedIndustries2 use influence of Landfillfund
@StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL Couldn‚Äôt have put it better myself üòÇüëçüèΩüëåüèΩ
@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL Try living here you twat.

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL You make it sound like a nice day out sightseeing or a garden party not an environmental and health crisis. Put it into special measures, get someone experienced and reputable to cap it off and shut it down. Fresh air is a basic human right but to us it's a luxury.

tweets.text:
@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL What IS the progress? It absolutely stinks again. Now in all directions. 

So? Answers are needed. We have now had enough. Actions not PR. Actions not pictures. Whatever you are doing IS NOT working. You are destroying my ability to work. @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off #StopTheStink

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL You don‚Äôt need to visit the town to hear from us residents. Just join our Facebook group https://t.co/vgsxPIkUK4 and you will see post after post,night after night of residents begging for clean air and struggling with their health. You don‚Äôt want to see the truth. #stopthestink

tweets.text: @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL Right this minute I am locked in a bedroom with air purifier, fan blowing, bottled water, paracetamol, and no intention if leaving my bedroom even for a pee. Sounds like fun. I am 64. I have sore eyes. I have a headache. My nose is swollen.THAT IS THE REALITY 2.5 MILES AWAY.

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL Hear from residents! üò°üò°You, your secretary or @JamesBevanEA are incapable of responding to any correspondence or email. You have failed in regulating @RedIndustries2  as our health concerns grow - it‚Äôs out of control  #Stopthestink @StinkStopthe BTW it stinks now (again)

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids Where‚Äôs the update about the leaking pipe?and the alternative source of hydrogen sulphide? @PHE_uk where‚Äôs the mention about increased GP visits? how are you collecting health data? So many questions left unanswered in your reports! #stopthestink

So @PHE_uk @PHE_WestMids @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA Please tell me, If I hit someone once a day and the pain of that assault is transient and brief, does it not count If I do it once a day, every day for a week, a month, a year, two years, three years?

tweets.text: @scottdegg @StinkStopthe @theJeremyVine @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk @RedIndustries2 It‚Äôs such a shame the air quality report yet again says in essence we‚Äôre overreacting . @EnvAgency you‚Äôre pathetic , @PHE_uk you‚Äôre also an absolute disgrace .

@ClareDinnisEA @AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 You could close it if you chose. RI are grossly incompetent & have no scruples. In order to wind the place down & in view of their mismanagement capping should be passed to a reputable operator. This should be the equivalent of putting a hospital or school into special measures

Nice work 
@RedIndustries2 @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk @PHE_WestMids @JamesBevanEA https://t.co/W0bNbpJQYo

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids How can @PublicHealthEng say long term effects this is unprecedented. You said your self it‚Äôs the worst landfill  @EnvAgency have dealt with. They said may cause minor symptoms, daily headache sore throat dry itchy eyes is not minor

The Westlands right nowü§Æü§Æ
Gut wrenching fumes & throat prickling already. Pray the purifier keeps on top of it & it‚Äôs not another night like last night, we can‚Äôt continue like this @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency
What the hell is plan B?! @Cap_it_off #stopthestink https://t.co/Jeo9w8QEmm

Maybe @ClareDinnisEA could consider staying over here sometime soon and smelling it herself for a length of time. @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk @PHE_WestMids @StinkStopthe #StopTheStink https://t.co/yl71FtUnCf

@ClareDinnisEA @maricaoneill @EnvAgencyMids Why is it only now your listening? This has gone on for years for us, for years we have been told it‚Äôs nothing that we‚Äôre imagining it. I don‚Äôt imagine been woke up at 3am choking on the air I have to breathe to stay alive, daily headache sore throat dry itchy eyes

I never had a fear of odours before but I‚Äôm certainly developing one this week, can‚Äôt bear another night of this @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA #stopthestink https://t.co/spzFlxeANK
@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL I hope you're ready for what is coming. They're killing us.

The Otter Estuary Restoration should be brilliant, but it is quickly becoming a disaster! Tree & vegetation cover removal from 4th May is appalling bad practice for nesting birds, regardless of dormice. Time to stop. @EnvAgency @kiergroup @Natures_Voice https://t.co/oTzDbjCBof

@5_News @peterofthelane @5_News Thank you so much for covering this story today. Like many people in the area, I was woken up at 1am this morning due to the stench filling the house. It shouldn‚Äôt be allowed to happen and this coverage may help bring it to an end. @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids Why has it taken you so long to listen? I‚Äôve nearly lost my mind over where we live. I‚Äôve had to leave my home with my children on multiple occasions. You‚Äôve discredited all we have reported until it got so loud you had to listen. I‚Äôm exhausted with fighting. Too little VERY late

@WiseBirding @EnvAgency @kiergroup @Natures_Voice So many birds and mammals will die, including fledglings. There are Cetti's warbler in the scrub, a schedule 1 species, destruction of their nests is simply illegal @DevonLiveNews @IoloWilliams2 @ChrisGPackham

The final #CitizenshipEveningSchool session this evening on the Climate Emergency. Massive thanks to @slowtheflow_UK‚Äôs Bede Mullen, @ScottAPatient @OnnMel @JustGaiaHX‚Äôs Natalie Denby + @EnvAgencyYNE‚Äôs Adrian Gill. Thanks to all the students for taking part, it‚Äôs been a pleasure! https://t.co/Bz7aCRUlmZ

tweets.text: @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL What progress? It‚Äôs not getting any better, we are meant to believe that by midnight tomorrow this will of gone away? & then we have 3 more cells to go through? Enough is enough we want fresh air to enjoy our homes

Is this what putting "Pressure on the water industry to better protect the environment", looks like? 

@EnvAgency? https://t.co/GQpYeUQw1e

2/5 Our @EnvAgencyMids #enforcement notice requires the #landfill operator to cap parts of #WalleysQuarry by midnight 30/04/21. 

This is an important milestone but there will be more to do limit odour. 

I saw progress today üëá and discussed next steps with @RedIndustries2 https://t.co/o3V9B20fdG

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 You saying that you ‚Äòsaw progress today‚Äô means nothing. The people of Newcastle under Lyme need to smell progress. No excuses, do your job and #StopTheStink
@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 That‚Äôs got to be one magic layer of plastic and soil to substantially reduce these odours. It‚Äôs completely off the scale tonight. #stopthestink

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids We‚Äôve asked you to meet face to face countless times. We‚Äôve asked for action. We‚Äôve called, emailed, protested... only now do you make a statement. I only hope your own family are never subjected to living conditions like this. We are helpless and overwhelmed with the stench.

@nightmaresurrey @Guildford_Cons Flood alleviation was a major issue in previous administration. Apparently this has been resolved with @EnvAgency I look forward to seeing what this means for Godalming. Wellies or wetsuits?

One year ago today: #StaffsSUNRISE broke ground and began the creation of our new river channel at @stokecity's old Victoria Ground. 
What a difference a year makes! 
Thanks to our partners/supporters on this project: @EnvAgencyMids @SoTCityCouncil @WildTroutTrust @StModwen https://t.co/h8QvZsuGQ1
